tasks.label: Compile All UI Files
tasks.command: pyuic5 form.ui -o ui_form.py && pyuic5 cocktailCard.ui -o ui_cocktailCard.py && pyuic5 bottleParameter.ui -o ui_bottleParameter.py && pyuic5 bottleDialog.ui -o ui_bottleDialog.py && pyuic5 dispenserControl.ui -o ui_dispenserControl.py && pyuic5 ingredientCard.ui -o ui_ingredientCard.py && pyuic5 ingredientCardDialog.ui -o ui_ingredientCardDialog.py && pyuic5 extraBottle.ui -o ui_extraBottle.py && pyuic5 cocktailStep2Button.ui -o ui_cocktailStep2Button.py && pyuic5 cocktailStep1Button.ui -o ui_cocktailStep1Button.py && pyuic5 cocktailStep.ui -o ui_cocktailStep.py
